form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form Number: A2 296 599

full_text: Screened by NARA. 8/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place BOSTON MA File No. A21 296 599 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Name SEX DATE OF BIRTH Street Trieu Thuan HUYNH M 10-12-15 Address PLACE OF BIRTH 37 Moody Drive .
